1.Text:
One particular day, as the end of the year
approaches...

...So, to prevent robberies and pickpocketing leading
up to the Holidays, we are thinking of increasing the
patrols around town.

You mean, given there'll be more shoppers and pricier
items on display in the stores...

That's a valid point. I have no objections. Proceed
with the arrangements.

However, make sure the knights aren't overwhelmed
with work.
Yes, Princess! Understood!

(The Holidays...a relatively new tradition, but it
seems to have resonated with the general populace
far more than I imagined.)

(Giving gifts to loved ones, decorating with trees
and wreaths... These concepts are not well known
within the castle walls, but they're lovely.)

(I really ought to delve deeper into the everyday
lives of our citizens...)
Alexia.
I-Iris...?!
H-Hold on...! Why the rush? What's the matter?
I-It's nothing.

Then why did you bolt like that? Is something wrong?
If so, you can tell me about it—
I-I'm in a hurry!
Huh?

I'm, uh...meeting with a school friend. I've got to
go...!
Wait, Alexia...!
(I-Is she avoiding me...? Why...?)
It didn't end there...
Ah, Alexia. Can we chat for a moment—
I have training now...!
How about we train together—
I-I've been summoned by my teacher!
Alexi—
I'm off to patrol!
(Wait, is she really avoiding me? But why...?)
On one such day...
*sigh* She's escaped me again...

(I thought we were growing closer lately...but I
guess things aren't that simple.)
P-Please! Ma'am!
...What's going on? Is there a problem?

This area is exclusively for VIP customers.
Unauthorized entry is not allowed...
I'm looking for someone.

Are you looking for an acquaintance? If so, we can
help you find them...

Have you seen her? She's an elf, just like me.
Where is she? Any help would be appreciated.

Sorry, an elf? You are the only one I have seen
today...

I see. Very well. I'll look for her myself. Sorry for
the trouble.

B-But, Miss! This area is exclusively for VIP
customers...!

Sorry, she's with me. I'll accompany her, so can we
let it slide this time?
P-Princess Iris...! My apologies.

In that case, there's no issue at all. Would you like
us to prepare a private room for you...?

No, that won't be necessary. Please don't worry about
it.
Of course. Do let us know if you need anything.
Well...it's been a while, Lady Beatrix.

Thank you for your help, Princess Iris. They were
giving me a hard time and wouldn't listen to reason.
So it seemed. Are you here looking for your niece?

Yes. I hear this place is popular among youngsters.
They have quite a variety of items on display here...

This is a place where everyone enjoys shopping. That
said, finding your niece in this specific area might
prove challenging.

After all, this area is for the upper-class
aristocracy and certain affluent individuals.
I see... Have you come here to shop?
Yes, I'm looking for a Holiday gift.
A "Holiday gift"?
Lady Beatrix, are you familiar with the Holidays?

I've heard of it. They're selling Holiday-related
items everywhere in town.
In simple terms, it's like a winter festival...

It comes with a tradition of exchanging gifts with
loved ones. I thought I'd give it a try.

I see. What a lovely tradition. Hehe. Did you find a
good gift?

Yes. Not that I'd expect anything less from
Mitsugoshi. I'm sure my sister will love it...

...I'm sorry. That was insensitive of me, especially
when you're so concerned about finding your niece...

Don't worry about it. In fact, I plan on celebrating
the Holidays in my own way.

Once we're reunited, I'd like to exchange "Holiday
gifts" with her.

That's good to hear. It would be nice if you could
enjoy the Holidays while searching for her...

...I've got an idea! Lady Beatrix, there's a perfect
event that allows you to celebrate the Holidays
while searching for your niece.
Really?

Yes, the upcoming Saint Selection Ceremony...
Would you like to attend it with me?

2.Text: "Saint Selection Ceremony"...? Never heard of it.

I'm not surprised. It's an event newly established
this year.

I don't know much about it either, but it's
apparently related to the Holidays.

I've been invited as a guest of honor, but it seems
like it's open to anyone. I expect many citizens will
attend.
You think I might find my niece there...?

Or perhaps someone who knows something about her
whereabouts. If you're interested, Lady Beatrix, why
don't you join me?

What a kind and unexpected offer. I would love to
participate.

In that case, I will contact the event organizers
immediately. I was informed we'll need special
ceremonial outfits for the occasion.
We'll have to change outfits?

It's typical for such events. As a princess, I've
done it on several occasions.

This is my first time attending the Saint Selection
Ceremony, so I don't know the details...but I'm sure
it will be a dignified outfit befitting its name.

You sure that's how it works? I'm not really used to
dressing up...

Heheh. You would look stunning in any outfit,
Lady Beatrix.

On the day of the Saint Selection Ceremony, the two
arrive at the venue...
Um, Lady Beatrix... Do you mind if I wear my coat...?

Didn't I just tell you? I'm confiscating this. I'm
sure everyone wants to see you in that outfit.

W-Wait! I need to mentally prepare myself before
going out in this—
Ohhh... This outfit is so embarrassing...
Not at all. It's adorable and looks great on you.

...That said, what does this outfit have to do with
the Saint Selection Ceremony?
Well, about that...

You both look stunning! Truly the leading contenders
for the contest!

Contest...? I thought I was participating in a
ceremony to choose the Saint.

You're not wrong! It's a beauty contest to select
the most fitting and beautiful Santa for the season—
that's the Saint Selection Ceremony!

When it's your turn, please make your way to the
stage. Best of luck!
...And she's gone. Princess Iris, what's going on?
I'm so sorry!

I completely misunderstood what the Saint Selection
Ceremony was about...

I thought it would be a solemn ceremony...where the
selected individual receives the title of "Saint" and
offers prayers—
But it was actually a beauty contest.

...Yes. Ignorance is no excuse. My oversight is to
blame.

I'll speak to the organizers to withdraw your
participation, Lady Beatrix—
No, that won't be necessary.
B-But...

I was taken aback, but I'm not opposed to it. You may
have invited me, but I chose to participate.

Besides, I might spot my niece on the stage if I
compete in this contest.
Lady Beatrix...

Plus...plenty of guests are expected at the event,
right? We shouldn't let them down.

(She's so considerate despite the unexpected
circumstances...)

(Lady Beatrix is right. I can't believe I was so
flustered by the outfit's design that I nearly
overlooked the most important thing—my people...)

(No matter the format, the Saint Selection Ceremony is
for the people. It's clear what I need to do...!)

I have also made up my mind. If we've chosen to
participate, let's give it everything we've got!

Hehe. Let's cheer each other on. Even if we don't
fully understand the details.

3.Text:
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your patience!
Who is worthy of being Santa?! The Saint Selection
Ceremony beauty contest is about to commence!
Whoaaaaa!

Now then, contestants... Please make your way to the
stage!
Wait... No way! Isn't that Princess Iris?!

And next to her is the famed "Goddess of War,"
Beatrix! I can't believe we're seeing her outside of
the Bushin Festival—we're in for a real treat today!

Ladies and gentlemen, it appears you're as stunned
as I am by our star-studded surprise participants!
Frankly, I'm over the moon!

I thought I had become used to being watched at the
Bushin Festival, but this feels strangely different.

Yes, I know what you mean. I'm a little...no,
extremely nervous...!

Now, let's proceed to the first evaluation! First up,
the staple of such contests—the beauty showcase!
Beauty showcase...?

How you showcase your beauty is entirely up to you!
Let's kick things off with contestant number 1!

What is she...doing? The announcer mentioned a
showcase, but...

I think she's showcasing her elegant walk to the
audience. That's just a guess, though...

Just walking? No need to draw a sword or display any
techniques?

Judging by the atmosphere here, that doesn't seem
necessary.

True... What should I showcase, then? Other than my
martial skills, what else do I have to show?

For starters, the criteria for "beauty" in this
contest seems ambiguous. What kind of "beauty"
is worthy of the season—and fitting for Santa?
An impressive walk! Next up, contestant number 2!
Hmm... A dance, huh?
It certainly is beautiful, but...

As Iris and Beatrix express their uncertainty, the
other contestants complete their showcases. Finally,
the moment arrives...

Thank you for waiting! Coming up next is the
"Goddess of War"! Lady Beatrix, please grace
the stage with your presence!
Lady Beatrix...

I'm alright. Well, I feel a bit anxious, but I just
need to showcase something beautiful to the
audience, right?
Y-Yes, I believe that's the idea...

What will Lady Beatrix do? A sword dance or maybe
some kinda traditional elven performance...?
That's strange... She isn't moving at all.

What's the meaning of this? Lady Beatrix hasn't moved
an inch!

(Without so much as a smile or a pose. What could she
be thinking...?)

Facing a bewildered Iris and the audience, Beatrix
suddenly begins to whistle. And then—
Oh...look! Little birds are flocking to her...!

Incredible! Drawn by her whistling, small birds are
landing on Lady Beatrix's shoulders and arms!

(Not just that. The birds surrounding her are
fluttering so joyously... What a sight to behold...)
How divine...like witnessing a live painting.

This is the embodiment of "beauty" unique to an elf
who loves nature!

I...may not possess an innate beauty that captivates
others. However, like many here, I have a heart
capable of feeling "beauty."

The freedom of these birds is one form of "beauty" I
know. I wanted to convey that.

Magnificent! What a marvelous showcase, ensnaring
the audience's attention with her unique take! Who
would have thought the "Goddess of War" was also
a goddess of beauty!

(Well played, Lady Beatrix... I can't let myself be
outdone.)

Now, the moment we've all been waiting for! It's time
for the Crown Princess of Midgar's showcase! Princess
Iris, please take the stage!
R-Right!

(...What should I do? I'm not the type to flash a
sweet smile or pose alluringly like the other
contestants.)

(And I can't perform like Beatrix did.
So, the "beauty" I can convey is...)

Eeek! I can't believe I'm seeing her so up close...!
I wonder what she's gonna showcase...!

Ladies and gentlemen, today, I...Iris Midgar, wish to
use this platform to make a pledge to all of you.
A pledge...? Here?

This is quite the unexpected turn of events!
What kind of declaration will she make?!

I, Iris Midgar, swear to love, cherish, and respect
all the people living in this land!

Though royalty may stand at the head of a nation, I
firmly believe...our citizens do not stand beneath us.

The nation is its people! Can a nation prosper
without its citizens being happy?

Absolutely not! The prosperity of a nation is directly
linked to the happiness and well-being of its
citizens. As royalty, it is our solemn duty to ensure
this!

I pledge to fulfill my role as your princess, guiding
our nation and its people towards happiness...!

(All I can offer is my heartfelt dedication to our
nation and its people!)

My... It's as if we're witnessing a glimpse of her
future coronation ceremony...

Ohh... Long live Princess Iris! Long live Princess
Iris!

Hear the chorus of cheers erupting from the venue!
What an unexpected twist! I can't hold back my
tears...!

Hehe. Well done, Princess Iris. What an eloquent
speech.

And so, both Iris and Beatrix advance to the next
round of the contest...

4.Text:
Alright, let's move on to the second evaluation.
Up next, our judges are...the children!

Contestants, you'll be engaging with the kids
gathered on stage. After all, if you're fit to be
Santa, playing with kids should be a breeze!

(Play...? What am I supposed to do...? What does
"play" even mean?)

(...Am I even good with children? Even my own younger
sister keeps her distance from me...)

I just need to play with these kids, right? Leave it
to me.
Lady Beatrix...?
Hey, little girl. Want to become a hunter?
Hunter...? What's that?

You can shoot down birds and four-legged creatures
with a bow and arrow. That's the essence of hunting.
We elves learn how to hunt through play first.

But we don't really hunt living creatures for fun.
What we'll be doing now is "pretend hunting."
Just imagine you have a bow and arrow—
This lady's scary!
D-Did I make her cry...? How...?
(It seems Lady Beatrix is also struggling...)
Hunting? Who even does that nowadays? Ahaha!
Yeah, totally. Lame!

Those born as elves dedicate their lives to hunting.
It's no laughing matter.

What does that even mean? Show us something fun
instead!

...That's not a very polite thing to say, especially
to someone you just met who's your elder... How
about speaking a bit more respectfully?

Huh? But we're in charge right now, you know? 'Cause
we're the "judges"!

(...These children are a handful. And I can't be too
strict with them... What's my next move?)

You guys are super strong, right? Then let's see if
you can handle our squad move!
Now's our chance! Take this...huh?

Wh-Where'd they go?! My sword's gone, too... Where's
everything?!
Looking for this?
Whoa! Wh-When did you...?!

The moment you lifted that toy. I'm sorry, my body
just reacted.
Your squad needs a lot of work.
W-We've been busted...

Using power to recklessly attack others... Even if
you are just children, I can't let that slide.

...What's your move, young man? Princess Iris is
serious.
Whoa! You guys're so cool!
Huh...?
What's with the sudden change of heart?

Man, you're awesome, "Goddess of War"! Teach me that
move you just did!
Me too, me too!

I can teach you, but...before that, isn't there
something you need to do first?

When you ask someone to teach you, you should
bow your head and say "please teach me." This is
especially important in martial arts.

True strength comes from a pure heart.
Come on, try again.
Ulp... S-Sorry. Please teach me your sword technique!
Please teach me, too!
Heheh. Alright.

Oh, another unexpected turn of events! A sword lesson
with Lady Beatrix and Princess Iris! The children
look ecstatic!

My, my, just look at Princess Iris's gentle smile.
She truly is wonderful.

Lady Beatrix's dignified expression is also
impressive. It's clear she's earnest in her
desire to teach them.

And with that, the second evaluation wraps up,
with both Iris and Beatrix passing. The contest
enters a brief intermission.

5.Text: Whew...

You seem tired. Not that I blame you, this break
couldn't have come sooner...

Yeah. I was constantly surprised by the unexpected
evaluation process.

I was, too. It was a format I've never experienced
before... Honestly, I was taken aback.
That said, I find it quite refreshing and engaging.
I feel the same as well.

...If my niece were here, would my spirits be lifted
even higher?
Lady Beatrix...
...I'm sorry. I didn't mean to make you worry.

You really care a lot about your family, don't you,
Lady Beatrix? Your relentless search for your niece
has taken you to various places...

Well, it's for someone important to me... Wouldn't
you do the same, Princess Iris?

Yes...I'm sure I would undertake the same search if I
were separated from my sister...from Alexia.

Indeed... Heheh. Your sister is lucky to have such a
caring big sister.

No, I don't think I've been a good big sister...
Lately, she's been distant from me.

Every time we cross paths, she runs away. It's like
she's deliberately avoiding me...

I'm sure there's a reason... Have you asked her
directly?
...No. Maybe I'm scared to ask.
I don't get it. Why are you scared of your family?

Alexia... She's changed lately. She's made friends I
don't know and often spends time alone, looking
conflicted.

The distance between us might be because of the
change in Alexia... She's probably going through
a phase.

It could also be that she's grown. That's not a bad
thing.
Yes, of course.

But being her big sister, my curiosity gets the best
of me. I really want to ask, "What happened?" But I
can't bring myself to...
Why...can't you?

I think I'm afraid...of history repeating itself.
I don't want to see her suffer because of
something I say.
I'm sure it's best...if I don't intervene.

How someone receives words is up to the individual.
Sometimes, you may unintentionally hurt them, but...

Still, if you don't put your feelings into words,
you can't convey them.

(Lady Beatrix is right. In my desire not to hurt my
sister, I've turned myself into a coward...)

(But the way things are now, the day we truly
understand each other may never come.)

...After this contest is over, I'll confront Alexia
and talk to her.

I don't know how she'll react, but I still want to...
tell her how I feel.
...Heheh. That's a great smile.
Huh? R-Really...?

I'm sure your love for your sister brought it out.
Family really is a wonderful thing.
...Yes, I agree.

The final evaluation will start shortly. Please
proceed to the venue!

Is it already that time? Maybe we spent too much time
chatting.
No, it was time very well spent. Thank you.

From here on out, we'll be rivals once more.
Let's fight fair and square to the end...!
Yes. Let's both give it our all. I'm counting on you.

6.Text:
Now, the Saint Selection Ceremony is finally coming
to a climax! From here on, we enter the final
evaluation!

Who will make it back to town first, navigating from
the snowfield and through the forest? Let the
Reindeer Race begin!
Reindeer Race... So, is it like horseback riding?

According to popular tales, Santa is said to ride on
a sleigh drawn by reindeer. This must have been
inspired by that.

But the reindeer we have lined up for you are far
from ordinary!

You will all be riding on these magical beast
reindeer!
Magical beasts?! Isn't that dangerous...?

No need to worry! While they are magical beasts, most
have been tamed to some extent...though there might
be a few wild ones in the mix.

You are free to pick any magical beast reindeer you
want, but it's first come, first serve! Alright...
Ready, Set, Go!
Hehe... Interesting.

While the other participants are rushing to choose
their reindeer...you're awfully relaxed, aren't you?
Yes, I'll take my time choosing.
...Oh? What's that...?
Graaarrrr!

Oh dear! One of the magical beast reindeer is
rejecting a participant! It's...the most ferocious
male, Merry Whip!

Merry Whip...? His name sounds cute, but his
appearance says otherwise...
Hmm. He seems quite fast.

Yes, but his training appears to have been a bit
inadequate.
Grrrrrr...!

It looks like, this time, Merry Whip has locked onto
Princess Iris and Miss Beatrix! What will happen?!
Okay, I've made up my mind. I'll ride this one.

...Wait, hold on. I was actually thinking about
choosing him.

How about this? Whoever manages to tame Merry Whip
first gets to ride him.
Heheh. Sounds good. Let's go with that.
Graaarrrr!

That said, taming him like this might be difficult.
In that case...
First, we'll need to establish dominance...won't we?

Yes. It's the law of nature—survival of the fittest.
We need to show him who's stronger.
Grarrr...?!

Whoa there! Merry Whip appears to be hesitating! Are
these two intimidating him?!
Graaarghhh!
You're set on resisting, huh...!

We should watch out for those antlers and his kicks.
A direct hit could force us to retreat.

You're right... We need to both be cautious while
confidently asserting our strength!

7.Text: Princess Iris, now!
Right, leave it to me!
Grarrr...
It looks like he's finally calmed down... Oh?

What's this? The troublemaker Merry Whip is
approaching Princess Iris!

Oh? It seems you're the one who can handle him,
Princess Iris.
Heheh. Good boy...

Looks like you two will make a great team. I'll have
to pick another one...

Alright, ready. Princess Iris, let's have a good
race.
Yes, let's do it. No holding back!

Princess Iris and Lady Beatrix are on their reindeer
and have started the race!

However, despite their initial struggles, the other
participants are already ahead! Can the two catch up?!

Merry Whip, was it? You don't like losing either,
do you?

Looks like those two are super motivated... We can't
fall behind.

Whoa... Both of them are moving at incredible speeds!
This is heading for a surprising twist!
Well then, let's make our way to town first!

And now, the first to arrive in town after navigating
the snowfields and forest is—

Princess Iris and Lady Beatrix! It's now a
head-to-head race! Who will cross the
finish line first...?!
Race to the finish!
This is the moment of truth...!
...GOAAAAAL!!! And the verdict is...

I-I-Incredible! Princess Iris and Miss Beatrix are
tied for first place!

*huff, huff* I thought I could pull ahead...but it
looks like I was over-optimistic.

No, you managed to control that wild reindeer all the
way here. That's nothing short of impressive.

It's an honor to hear you say that, Lady Beatrix.
...It was a fun competition.
I agree. It's been a while since I felt so fired up.

Let's compete again sometime. Whether a reindeer race
or...a sword fight.
You bet. I look forward to it.
Later, after all the evaluations are completed...

Now, let's announce the results. This year's "Saint"
is...

Princess Iris and Miss Beatrix! Both of you are the
winners!
Heheh... I graciously accept, along with Lady Beatrix.
Yes. I accept the title of "Saint" with gratitude.

Congratulations to both of you! And that wraps up
this year's Saint Selection Ceremony. See you all
next year!
Thank you for accompanying me throughout the day.
I enjoyed myself as well. It was an intriguing event.
But...sadly, my niece wasn't there either.

...I see. I'm sorry I couldn't be of any help once
again...
Not to worry. Your support is always helpful.

Please, it's nothing. As fellow believers in the
value of family, I'll always be there to assist you.

Thank you. That means a lot... I'm lucky to have a
friend like you.

Well then, I'll go change now. I can't go home in
these clothes...
Um... May I come in for a moment?
Alexia...! What're you doing here?

I saw the Saint Selection Ceremony.
Congratulations...to both you and Lady Beatrix.

Yes, thank you. Did you come all this way just to
tell me that...?

I-It was a coincidence! I just happened to see the
ceremony...and to pass by the green room...!

(Despite what she's saying, she must have come to see
me... I'm touched.)

(If I'm going to ask her, now is the time... I made
up my mind to confront her and not run away...!)
Alexia, there's something I want to ask you...
Wh-What is it...?

Why have you been avoiding me lately? If there's a
reason, I'd like to know.
Um, well, you see...!

Of course, whatever you tell me, I'll listen without
judging.

If you don't want to talk about it right now, that's
fine too. But if there's anything I can do—
H-Here...!
Huh...? What's this...? A package from Mitsugoshi?
It's a Holiday...gift.
F-For me...?! I-In that case...here!
You got a gift for me, too...?

Yes. I really wanted to give it to you... I heard
that people in town exchange gifts with their
loved ones during the Holidays.

...Happy Holidays, Alexia. Isn't this how you're
supposed to celebrate it?
That's right... Happy Holidays, Iris.
...What a lovely scene.

I-I'm so sorry! I wasn't being considerate to you,
Lady Beatrix...

No need to apologize. I wouldn't want to intrude on
such a beautiful bond between sisters.
Anyway, aren't you two going to open your gifts?
R-Right. Well then...
...A stuffed bear.

...Isn't it adorable? I also bought a Santa outfit
for it. I thought it'd be nice to display in your
room... Hehe.
Sure, I'll do that. Well, Iris, open yours as well.

Yes, of course. I wonder what you could've gotten for
me.
...Wh-Wh-Wh-What is this?!

It's a thong. When you saw it at Mitsugoshi
before, you said it was shameless...

But considering your outfit today...I figured your
perspective might have changed. Your outfit really
suits you, so why not wear this, too...!

Th-This outfit is for the Saint Selection Ceremony.
I didn't have a choice...!

A thong...? I've never seen one, but it looks like
it would be easy to move in.
Lady Beatrix?!
Hmm. It seems to be made of good material.

Yes, it's incredibly comfortable to wear. Come on,
Iris, try it on!
S-Seriously...Alexia!

As they chat in the green room, the three feel the
warmth of family bonds...
